import React from "react"; // react plugin for creating notifications over the dashboard import NotificationAlert from "react-notification-alert"; // react-bootstrap components import {Alert, Button, Card, Col, Container, Modal, Row,} from "react-bootstrap"; function Notifications() { const [showModal, setShowModal] = React.useState(false); const notificationAlertRef = React.useRef(null); const notify = (place) => { const color = Math.floor(Math.random() * 5 + 1); let type; switch (color) { case 1: type = "primary"; break; case 2: type = "success"; break; case 3: type = "danger"; break; case 4: type = "warning"; break; case 5: type = "info"; break; default: break; } let options = {}; options = { place: place, message: (
Welcome to Light Bootstrap Dashboard React - a beautiful freebie for every web developer.
), type: type, icon: "nc-icon nc-bell-55", autoDismiss: 7, }; notificationAlertRef.current.notificationAlert(options); }; return ( <>
